attributes.action: abolish the present second homes allowance replacing it with a flat sum when it is necessary for an MP to be in London working on Commons business.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mp Expenses need to be limited as regards accommodation requirement when attending the Commons or on Parliamentary Business. Irrespective as to whether an MP has a London property or alternate accommodation for those days when it is impracticable to return to his Constituency home he shall be entiled to receive a fixed sum of say £150 nightly or the overnight allowance paid to Class 1 Civil Servants.
The present system of declaring second homes etc should be immediatly abolished.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
